scripts.build: curl -LO https://github.com/lorenmh/mnist_handwritten_json/raw/master/mnist_handwritten_test.json.gz && curl -LO https://github.com/lorenmh/mnist_handwritten_json/raw/master/mnist_handwritten_train.json.gz && gunzip *.gz && mv mnist_handwritten_train.json train.json && mv mnist_handwritten_test.json test.json && cd client && npm i && npm run build
